mapper.insert: insert into inquiry (inquiry_title, inquiry_contents, writer, member_id) values (#{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryContent}, #{inquiryWriter}, #{member.id})
mapper.select: select * from inquiry order by inquiry_id desc
mapper.update: update inquiry set inquiry_contents = #{inquiryContent}, mod_date = now() where inquiry_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into answer (inquiry_id, reply_content, writer) values (#{inquiry.id}, #{AnswerContent}, #{AnswerWriter} )
mapper.update: update answer set reply_content = #{AnswerContent}, where id = #{id}
